variations.description: Teleports to the back of the enemy and deals Physical DMG equal to 210% of ATK to a single target. The attack is repeated on a critical hit, up to 3 times.
Teleports to the back of the enemy and deals Physical DMG equal to 245% of ATK to a single target. The attack is repeated on a critical hit, up to 3 times.
Teleports to the back of the enemy and deals Physical DMG equal to 280% of ATK to a single target. The attack is repeated on a critical hit, up to 3 times.
Teleports to the back of the enemy and deals Physical DMG equal to 315% of ATK to a single target. The attack is repeated on a critical hit, up to 3 times.
Teleports to the back of the enemy and deals Physical DMG equal to 350% of ATK to a single target. The attack is repeated on a critical hit, up to 3 times.
Marks an enemy in the back row for 10 seconds. Increases the unit's Crit Chance by 24% when attacking the marked enemy.
Marks an enemy in the back row for 10 seconds. Increases the unit's Crit Chance by 28% when attacking the marked enemy.
Marks an enemy in the back row for 10 seconds. Increases the unit's Crit Chance by 32% when attacking the marked enemy.
Marks an enemy in the back row for 10 seconds. Increases the unit's Crit Chance by 36% when attacking the marked enemy.
Marks an enemy in the back row for 10 seconds. Increases the unit's Crit Chance by 40% when attacking the marked enemy.

skins.name: Idyllic Vacation
skins.description: Lounging on the couch, Nemesi is enjoying her rare rest days.$B$"What are you doing here? Are you supposed to be off today?"
